_comment: AGGRESSIVE TRADING CONFIGURATION - Lower thresholds, higher risk limits, momentum-focused

market_scanner._min_daily_volume_comment: Lowered to 250K to capture more small-cap momentum stocks
market_scanner._max_universe_size_comment: Expanded from 300 to 1000 stocks with smart optimizations
market_scanner._tiered_analysis_comment: Tier1 (100 stocks) analyzed every execution, Tier2 (200) every 5th, Tier3 (700) every 15th
market_scanner._pre_filter_comment: Pre-filter eliminates 60-70% of symbols before expensive analysis. Volume ratio lowered to 0.10 (10%) to allow early-day trading
market_scanner._intraday_screener_comment: Scans 1000 random stocks every execution for volume spikes (today's volume > 5x average). Catches momentum breakouts in real-time.

lambda._timeout_comment: Increased from 10 to 12 minutes for 1000 stock universe
lambda._memory_comment: Increased from 1024 to 2048 MB for parallel processing

execution._comment: PDT GROWTH MODE ACTIVE: Aggressive capital growth strategy to reach $25K. Disables profit-taking, holds winners indefinitely, preserves day trades. Smart execution optimizations: parallel data fetch, intraday caching, conditional strategies. Tiered analysis DISABLED to analyze all stocks every execution.

trading._consensus_comment: PDT GROWTH MODE: Lowered to 0.12 for more aggressive entries to maximize growth opportunities
trading._slippage_comment: Max acceptable slippage as percentage (1.0 = 1%). Trades exceeding this will be rejected.

pdt_tracking._comment: Pattern Day Trading protection: threshold is account value above which PDT doesn't apply, limit is max day trades in 5 days

intraday_exit_rules._comment: PDT GROWTH MODE: pdt_aware_mode=true enables selective EOD exits (only losses >2%), preserves day trades. Take-profit/trailing stops/breakeven DISABLED via pdt_growth_mode flag in code.

strategies._weights_comment: Pure day trading strategies - removed swing trading strategies (2025-11-17)

layer1_trade_level._comment: PDT GROWTH MODE: Increased max position to 25%, wider stops (2x ATR) to avoid premature exits

layer3_time_based._comment: PDT GROWTH MODE: Higher loss tolerances to allow for larger swings while building capital
